channel.title: Aegisub dev Blog on
channel.description: Recent content in Aegisub dev Blog on

item.title: Aegisub development blog now open
item.description: Aegisub: Aegisub development blog now open This is a bit of an experiment, something we (at the Aegisub team) have talked about a few times: A development blog. The idea behind this blog is simply to have somewhere to post longer texts about Aegisub development and subtitling/video/technology in general. I hope it’ll become a success, but let’s see :)
